data.eml:eml: New species and revalidations of scarab beetles (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae: Athyreini and Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) from Costa Rica and Panama

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kohlmann, Bert, Solís, Ángel (2012): New species and revalidations of scarab beetles (Coleoptera: Geotrupidae: Athyreini and Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) from Costa Rica and Panama. Zootaxa 3193: 28-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211122
